short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies all visible issue titles as links. Works with Jira, GitHub, Google Issue Tracker, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is for use with Jira, GitHub, BugTower, DoneDone, Asana, Linear, and Google's Issue Tracker (Buganizer).  It copies all issues that are currently visible in your browser over to your clipboard - link and all.  You can then paste them into an e-mail or any other document editor that supports rich text.  Useful for status reports if you find yourself doing this repetitive copy/paste dance on a daily basis.
